DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate clinical substantial equivalence of iVue as comparable to commercially available RTVue.
DOC.criteria: Normal: Normal results from clinical exam and free of ocular pathology. Glaucoma: Clinical exam results consistent with glaucoma and visual field defects consistent with glaucoma. Cornea: Clinical exam results consistent with cornea pathology. Retina: Clinical exam results consistent with retina pathology
